titles.title: For the relief of Web's Construction Company, Incorporated.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Claims.

bill.summary: 11/10/1999--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a specified sum to a named company incorporated in Maryland in full satisfaction of company claims in connection with construction work performed for the Corps of Engineers.
